price: Na Malaika watakuwa pembezoni mwa mbingu; na wanane juu ya hawa watakuwa wamebeba Kiti cha Enzi cha Mola wako Mlezi.
arabic: وَٱلۡمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرۡجَآئِهَاۚ وَيَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ ثَمَٰنِيَةٞ
footnotes: Na Malaika pembezoni mwake, na wapo Malaika wanane siku hiyo watakao beba Kiti cha Enzi cha Mola wako Mlezi, juu ya Malaika hawa wengine.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wal-malaku ʿalā arjāihā wayaḥmilu ʿarsha rabbika fawqahum yawma-idhin thamāniyatun
